page.title: 15IMPROVEMENTS-TEANASSIE AREA
page.content: The girls think there should be hockey teams for them only as the boys have shinty teams.Nearly everybody would like to see improvements on our roads for safety reasons.The boys would like better football and shinty pitches and BMX tracks in this area.Other people would like to see youth centres and swimming pools nearer to us.Some people would like farmers to improve their fences as sheep can escape and spoil gardens. Boys would like to see rifle clubs,where they could practice with their air rifles.
